title: Catching Up: What The VA Secretary's Resignation Means
teaser: Amid reports of excessive wait times for veterans' health care, VA Secretary Eric Shinseki has resigned. NPR's Arun Rath speaks with correspondent Quil Lawrence about the problems in the agency and the fallout of the resignation.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
